amendments.description: Adds TIER 11: FIBONACCI REFLECTION COMPONENTS - Golden zone bounce detection, reflection point signals, normalized arch patterns. AWAITING USER INPUT on reflection mechanism details.

pending_concepts.title: Fibonacci Reflection Normalized Arch
questions: What is 'reflection' - price bouncing off golden fib levels?
What is 'normalized arch' - parabolic curve between fib zones?
How does it generate signals - entry on touch, confirmation on bounce?
Is this tied to specific timeframes (1m, 15m)?
Does it modify signal strength or generate independent signals?
pending_concepts.notes: User mentioned this concept but details not yet documented in V11 files or past conversations
